detail_desc: Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from patterned organic cotton. Top with raglan sleeves, concealed press-studs at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, short, flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small embroidery detail on the chest, collar with a contrasting colour lining, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long earrings in plastic and metal with fabric tassels at the ends. Length 17.5 cm.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top, and a flounce around the neckline.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. The costume has a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front and elasticated hems. The helmet has a hook and loop fastening at the front.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves and a drawstring at one side of the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a print motif, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.

Long, wide hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar and fleece-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and narrow elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft fleece inside.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.

Long blouse in woven fabric with a wrapover V-neck for easier nursing access, decorative gathers on the shoulder seams and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam under the bust with a narrow tie belt. Unlined.
Hair elastics without metal clips.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Deep V-neck front and back and a concealed zip at the back. Two flounces over the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a flared skirt with a lightweight viscose lining. Smocking around the neckline, sleeves and waist.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with a text print on the front and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap that can be detached with the help of plastic carabiner hooks. Zip and plastic snap lock at the top, a two-part inner compartment, and two outer compartments, one with a zip and the other with a hook and loop fastener. Two loops at the back so the bag can be fastened to a belt. Lined. Size 17.5x20 cm.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Sandals with a zip and loop at the back of the heels. Imitation leather insoles.

Super push-up bra in soft microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini briefs with a textured pattern and a low waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with pleats at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Short dress in airy woven fabric in an asymmetric cut with a double flounce that continues over one shoulder, silicone trim at the top and a wide tie-top shoulder strap. Lined.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and short sleeves.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved, round-necked top in sweatshirt fabric with striped ribbing in a contrasting colour around the neckline. Soft brushed inside.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Suit trousers in twill with a sheen. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly with a concealed button, side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a Henley top, leggings and hat in soft, ribbed jersey with sewn-in turn-ups. Top with a button placket and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and hem. Opening with ties at the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Jacket in sturdy leather with a pile-lined collar that can be turned up and fastened with a tab and press-stud. Two-way zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Pile lining.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and pair of shorts in patterned satin. Top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication and a frill trim at the waist.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.
Large sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Padded gilet with a detachable, pile-lined hood, zip with a chin guard at the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered elastication at the heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a layer of lace at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Long, pleated skirt in airy, patterned chiffon. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim. Lined at the top.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a decorative seam at the bottom, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
Hat in a soft, fluffy, rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.
Coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Studio Collection. Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist and reinforced crotch. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Cardigan in sturdy, patterned cotton jersey with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button, Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Playsuit in an airy plumeti viscose weave with a V-neck and open front section with ties at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with flounce-trimmed hems. Partly lined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with an adjustable waist with a hook and loop tab at the sides, press-studs and a zip fly. Diagonal pockets, closed seams at critical points, knee patches, reinforced hems and snow flaps with reinforced elastic at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and concealed key pocket in the waistband. Unlined. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
Reversible bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets at the front, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, fleece-lined hood and fleece-lined front pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs, narrow ribbing at the hem and reflective details. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short shorts in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist and side pockets.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Long, fitted jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and horizontal elastic straps. Integral sports bra with an elasticated hem and decorative mesh sections.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a seam and wide broderie anglaise-trimmed flounce at the hem.
Metal brooches with a text motif, one decorated with plastic beads and the other with sparkly stones. Length 5.7-6.2 cm.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Pleated jersey hair elastic.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and small embroidery detail on the chest. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
